page.title: 12MICRO-COMPUTERS IN STOCKPORT
page.content: Micro-computers are popular both at home and at school in 1985. Out of 34 families with junior age children at S.Paul's, 16 own a computer. Some boys talked about their computers and their favourite games. Leon said, "I like our school's BBC computer. You get fast loading with the disc drive. The best game is Chuckie-egg." Vinny said, "I got my VIC-20 a year ago. It came with a pack of books and games. My best game is Kongo Kong." Mark said, "The best game on my home computer is Airwolf. I have learnt how to do a program to print my name." Mike said, "I share my Spectrum with my family. Our best game is Booty."
